claims-messages.guidance-message: All partners in this project must upload evidence for each expenditure with every claim made. These might include invoices, timesheets, receipts or spreadsheets for capital usage. This is part of Innovate UK's obligations under the [Managing Public Money government handbook](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/managing-public-money?_ga=2.105018247.521318796.1576575366-1871284022.1544109966) in relation to assurance, financial management and control.
claims-messages.no-open-claims: There are no open claims. The next claim period begins {{nextClaimStartDate}}.
claims-messages.no-closed-claims: There are no closed claims for this partner.
claims-messages.no-remaining-claims: There are no claims. Innovate UK has approved the final claims.
claims-messages.iar-required: You must attach an independent accountant's report (IAR) to this claim.
claims-messages.final-claim-guidance:
We need to ask you a few questions about the project before we can make your last payment.

You also need to upload an independent accountant's report (IAR).

1.  Complete our survey.
2.  Download a copy from the survey website.
3.  Upload it here.

project-messages.claimToSubmitMessage: You need to submit your claim.
project-messages.claimRequiresRequiresIARMessage: You need to submit your IAR.

project-labels.percentageEligibleCostsClaimedLabel: Percentage of eligible costs claimed to date

document-messages.header:
You can upload up to 10 documents at a time. Each document must:

* be less than 10MB in file size
* have a unique file name that describes its contents

There is no limit to the number of files you can upload in total.
document-messages.infoTitle: What file types can I upload?
document-messages.infoContent:
You can upload these file types:

* PDF (pdf, xps)
* text (doc, docx, rdf, txt, csv, odt)
* presentation (ppt, pptx, odp)
* spreadsheet (xls, xlsx, ods)
* image (jpg, jpeg, png)
